prontera,138,125,5	script	卡普拉综合商店::ShoppingMall	4_F_KHELLISIA,{
cutin "kh_ellisia",2;
	mes "^cc6600卡普拉综合商店Y^000000 - №1";
	mes "---------------------------------";
	mes "这里是卡普拉综合商店";
	mes "我是首席交易员";
	mes "接收^999999金钱[Z]^000000和^996633卡普拉点数[P]^000000支付";
	mes "请在下列菜单中选择你需要类别";
	switch(select("^999999[Z]^000000 → 装备商店","^999999[Z]^000000 → 基础消耗品商店","^999999[Z]^000000 → 职业消耗品商店","^FF0000[W]^000000 → 超级市场"))
	{

	case 1:
		callshop "RoSF_Zeny_Shop_equip",0;
		end;
	case 2:
		callshop "RoSF_Zeny_Shop_item",0;
		end;
	case 3:
		callshop "RoSF_Zeny_Shop_jobs",0;
		end;
	case 4:{
		warp "market",100,144;}
		end;
}
	OnInit:
	waitingroom "卡普拉综合商店Y",0;
	end;
}
